I think it's safe to predict that Barack Obama will be the nominee of the Democratic Party, but he could be a stronger nominee if he receives a strong challenge in the primary. 13 February 2011 1:57 PM annamarinakors 13 February 2011 2:02 PM Judging by the tone of this piece, we can reasonably guess where Justin Webb 's tongue was during those Donald Rumsfeld press conferences. In my eight years in America for the BBC, I can honestly say that I never watched a single speech on the floor of either houses of Congress.
